mods.li: Science Never Stops: Ambition of the Cosmic

value.description: Cook a luxurious meal from one ingredient. Some ingredients are wasted, but not as many as Lavish meals typically waste.

Cook four luxurious meals from one ingredient. Some ingredients are wasted, but not as many as Lavish meals typically waste.\n\nNote: Bulk cooking luxurious meals is 15% faster overall than cooking 4 luxurious meals individually, not counting time to collect and transport cooking materials.

Make five nutrient bars from one ingredient. Nutrient bars take a while to prepare, but are more nutrient efficient than even Nutrient Paste.\n\nNote: You effectively get 5 times the food from the same nutrients that would be normally put into making meals.

Make twenty-five nutrient bars from one ingredient. Nutrient bars take a while to prepare, but are more nutrient efficient than even Nutrient Paste.

Note: You effectively get 5 times the food from the same nutrients that would be normally put into making meals.

Note: Bulk cooking nutrient bars is 15% faster overall than cooking nutrient bars five times individually, not counting time to collect and transport cooking materials.
Enhance a luxurious or lavish meal with Abyssal Matter.
Enhance five Nutrient Bars with Cosmic Alloy and Cosmic Matter.\n\nNote: You effectively get 5 times the food from the same nutrients that would be normally put into making meals.
Enhance 25 Nutrient Bars with Abyssal Alloy and Abyssal Matter.

Enhance five Nutrient Bars with Abyssal Alloy and Abyssal Matter.\n\nNote: Bulk cooking advanced nutrient bars is 15% faster overall than cooking nutrient bars five times individually, not counting time to collect and transport cooking materials.
Enhance four decadent meals with Eternal Fabric.

Enhance sixteen decadent meals with Eternal Fabric..\n\nNote: Bulk cooking decadent meals is 15% faster overall than cooking 4 decadent meals individually, not counting time to collect and transport cooking materials.

Enhance fifty advanced nutrient bars with Eternal Fabric.\n\nNote: Bulk cooking luxurious nutrient bars is 15% faster overall than cooking luxurious nutrient bars five times individually, not counting time to collect and transport cooking materials.
